title: Application Crash on Startup
solution: Reinstall the Visual C++ Redistributable for Visual Studio 2019, update your graphics drivers, and run the application as Administrator.

title: Missing DLL File
symptom: Error message saying a .dll file is missing
solution: Download the missing DLL from the official software vendor or reinstall the associated application to restore the file.

title: Blue Screen: KMODE_EXCEPTION_NOT_HANDLED
solution: Update or rollback recently installed drivers, run `sfc /scannow` in an elevated Command Prompt, and check for faulty RAM.

title: Blue Screen: IRQL_NOT_LESS_OR_EQUAL
solution: Uninstall any new hardware drivers, update the network and storage controllers, and test memory modules with MemTest86.

title: Blue Screen: PAGE_FAULT_IN_NONPAGED_AREA
solution: Disconnect external drives, run a disk check (`chkdsk /f /r`), and reseat or replace RAM sticks.

title: GPU Overheating
symptom: System shuts down or artifacts appear under load
solution: Clean GPU heatsink and fans, increase case airflow, and update to the latest GPU driver from the manufacturer.

title: CPU Overheating
symptom: System throttles performance or shuts down
solution: Reapply CPU thermal paste, ensure cooler is properly seated, and verify CPU fan is spinning at correct RPM.

title: No Boot Device Found
solution: Check BIOS/UEFI boot order, ensure your primary drive is detected, and replug SATA/NVMe cables.

title: No Video Output
solution: Reseat GPU in PCIe slot, test with motherboard video-out if available, and verify monitor cable integrity.

title: No POST & Beep Codes
symptom: Motherboard LEDs on but no beeps or display
solution: Check speaker/jumper on motherboard, remove all non-essential hardware, and reseat RAM and GPU.

title: Memory Error Detected
symptom: Random reboots, application crashes, or beep codes
solution: Run MemTest86 for several passes, test RAM modules individually, and replace any failing sticks.

title: Hard Drive Not Detected
symptom: Drive missing in BIOS or OS
solution: Verify power and data cables, test drive on another SATA port or in another PC, and check drive health with SMART tools.

title: SSD Very Slow Performance
symptom: Long load times, low read/write rates
solution: Enable TRIM (`fsutil behavior query DisableDeleteNotify`), update SSD firmware, and ensure AHCI mode is enabled in BIOS.

title: USB Device Not Recognized
solution: Try different USB ports, uninstall and reinstall USB controllers in Device Manager, and test device on another computer.

title: High CPU Usage
symptom: CPU at or near 100% during idle or light tasks
solution: Open Task Manager to identify culprit process, update or uninstall problematic software, and scan for malware.

title: High Memory Usage
symptom: System runs out of RAM and uses pagefile excessively
solution: Close memory-hungry applications, add more physical RAM, and check for memory leaks in background services.

title: Ethernet Disconnects Randomly
symptom: Loss of network connectivity over LAN
solution: Update network adapter drivers, replace Ethernet cable, and test on a different switch or router port.

title: Wi-Fi Connected But No Internet
symptom: Connected to SSID but no web access
solution: Forget/re-add network, reboot router, and update wireless adapter drivers.

title: Windows Update Failure
solution: Run Windows Update Troubleshooter, reset update components (`net stop wuauserv` etc.), and clear `SoftwareDistribution` folder.

title: Parameter Is Incorrect
solution: Run `DISM /Online /Cleanup-Image /RestoreHealth`, then `sfc /scannow`, and retry the operation.

title: DirectX Feature Level Not Supported
symptom: Game/graphics app fails with DirectX error
solution: Install the latest DirectX runtime from Microsoft, update GPU drivers, and ensure OS is up to date.

title: No Audio Output
solution: Check default playback device in Sound settings, update Realtek or audio chipset drivers, and verify cable connections.

title: Microphone Not Working
solution: Enable microphone in Privacy settings, set it as default device, update drivers, and test on another port or PC.

title: Keyboard Unresponsive
solution: Test with another keyboard, reboot the PC, update keyboard drivers, and check BIOS USB legacy support.

title: Printer Showing Offline
symptom: Cannot print; printer status is Offline
solution: Restart the print spooler service (`services.msc`), reconnect USB/network cable, and reinstall printer drivers.

title: Blue Screen: KERNEL_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILURE
solution: Update BIOS and drivers, run `sfc /scannow`, and check for disk corruption with `chkdsk`.

title: Blue Screen: MEMORY_MANAGEMENT
solution: Run MemTest86, replace faulty RAM modules, and update memory controller drivers.

title: Blue Screen: VIDEO_TDR_FAILURE
symptom: Display driver stopped responding and was recovered
solution: Reinstall GPU drivers, lower GPU overclock, and ensure proper power delivery to the graphics card.

title: Blue Screen: CRITICAL_PROCESS_DIED
solution: Check for corrupted system files (`sfc /scannow`), rollback recent updates, and run DISM repair.

title: Blue Screen: SYSTEM_SERVICE_EXCEPTION
solution: Update or uninstall recently installed drivers, scan for malware, and run Windows Update.

title: Blue Screen: THREAD_STUCK_IN_DEVICE_DRIVER
symptom: BSOD indicating a graphics driver hang
solution: Update GPU drivers, check for overheating, and rollback to a stable driver version.

title: Blue Screen: WHEA_UNCORRECTABLE_ERROR
symptom: Hardware error detected by Windows Hardware Error Architecture
solution: Test hardware components (CPU, RAM, motherboard), update firmware, and ensure proper cooling.

title: Blue Screen: APC_INDEX_MISMATCH
solution: Uninstall third-party antivirus or VPN software, and update kernel-mode drivers.

title: Blue Screen: BAD_POOL_HEADER
solution: Run `sfc /scannow`, check RAM modules, and update storage drivers.

title: Blue Screen: BAD_POOL_CALLER
solution: Update all drivers, check for faulty RAM, and disable overclocking.

title: Blue Screen: DRIVER_POWER_STATE_FAILURE
solution: Update device drivers, disable fast startup, and uninstall recently added hardware.

title: Blue Screen: POWER_IRQL_NOT_LESS_OR_EQUAL
solution: Update power management drivers, disable USB selective suspend, and check for faulty devices.

title: Blue Screen: UNMOUNTABLE_BOOT_VOLUME
solution: Run `chkdsk /f /r`, repair boot configuration with `bootrec`, and replace the drive if failing.

title: Blue Screen: PFN_LIST_CORRUPT
solution: Check and update storage controller drivers, test RAM, and run DISM repair.

title: Blue Screen: NTFS_FILE_SYSTEM
solution: Run `chkdsk`, update storage drivers, and check drive health.

title: Blue Screen: FAT_FILE_SYSTEM
solution: Run `chkdsk /f`, update storage drivers, and verify disk integrity.

title: USB Device Overcurrent Detected
symptom: USB ports disabled due to overcurrent
solution: Disconnect all USB devices, reboot, and reconnect one at a time to identify the faulty device.

title: DNS Probe Finished No Internet
symptom: Browser shows this error when loading pages
solution: Flush DNS cache (`ipconfig /flushdns`), change DNS servers to Google (8.8.8.8), and restart your router.

title: HTTP 500 Internal Server Error
solution: Check server logs for stack traces, ensure correct file permissions, and verify environment variables.

title: SSL Handshake Failure
symptom: Secure connections fail with SSL/TLS error
solution: Verify server certificate validity, update TLS libraries, and ensure client supports required cipher suites.
